---
title: "John"
---
**The Empathetic Soul**

**Strengths:** Loyal, emotionally attuned, loving

**Role in God’s Story:** John stays close to Jesus and helps us understand divine love through his gospel and letters. He models how intimacy with Jesus can deepen faith and compassion.

**Where he shows up in the Gospels:**

* [Mark 9:2–8](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Mark+9%3A2-8&version=NIV) – Present at the Transfiguration
* [John 13:21–26](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+13%3A21-26&version=NIV) – Reclines next to Jesus at the Last Supper
* [John 19:25–27](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+19%3A25-27&version=NIV) – Stays at the cross
* [John 20:1–9](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+20%3A1-9&version=NIV) – Runs to the empty tomb
